reviews_data.review_text: Best croissants in Charlotte. Flaky, buttery, soft, all the things!
Loved their croissants collection, coffee was good. Ambience was excellent.

from wherever you come from. If you are in Charlotte NC, you must visit this place. An authentic puff pastry croissant and the best coffee will await you in addition to a cozy atmosphere. Try the classic croissant and with bacon. Also a delicious hazelnut dessert.
Great coffee & consistently good pastries! Perfect for a Sunday morning coffee pickup.

I've been eyeing this place since they've opened, and if you like croissants this is your place!! The staff was great and the food was even better. The bacon egg and cheese croissant was a 10/10 I'll definitely be back :) they also have free parking which is hard to find on south blvd.
Amazing pastries and drinks! Love coming here for a sweet treat on a Saturday or Sunday morning. Some of the best pastries in town
Incredible pastries! The lamination of their dough is unreal.... Flavors are always delicious.... We love the kouign aman ... And the coffee is great too!
Great pastries, excellent breakfast sandwiches. A+
This place always has a line out the door and I can see why! The pastry selection and quality is impeccable and the coffee  Small dining space, so I definitely suggesting getting it to go.
Absolutely delicious  highly recommend
Amazing croissant, coffee hits right ! Definitely a hit

5 's. I don't care that it's a just a liiiittle more on the expensive side, or that they don't have the friendliest people, because those pastries more than make up for it. The price point makes sense considering how delicious those pastries are.  Would recommend to anyone. They sell out of their popular pastries quickly so I'd try to go in the AM.
Absolutely 5+++++******to this lovely atmosphere of yummies!!!! Croissants and coffee and friendly smiles. I work across the street. Love to go. Sam and Yerman amazing

[11/26/2024]
I drove for 40 minutes to get here.
But it was closed. So I spent my time ( 1hr 20 minutes) for NOTHING. I checked the Google before hitting the road.
You can change the time on Google for the customer's precious time& efforts. There is no phone number, so I can't check they're open or not. I feel like they don't care about customer's time.
So indifferent and careless...
_ _ _ _
It took a while to get here, but I enjoyed breads. I ordered the Pamasan Leek , Pistachio pound cake , Butter Croissant, and Almond Croissant. I wanted to try a chocolate croissant, but it was sold out. I really liked Butter Croissant and Pistachio Pound cake :) I will definitely visit again and try others.
Pastries never disappoint and they always have unique new things to try. The service is always friendly and quick, even when they are busy. Toddler approved!
Vicente's pastries are authentically exquisite. You can tell each delicious pastry is made with the utmost care. I will keep coming back!

This spot opened shortly after we moved from Charlotte. After watching all of my friends rave about it, I knew I needed to try it when my husband I came back to visit.

We had such a hard time deciding what to get. We ended up getting a breakfast sandwich, three savory croissants, and three sweet croissants.

It was way too much food for two people, but it was all fantastic. Whatever you get, you can't go wrong here.
the baked goods were all really good but my matcha was not it. he could've used a bamboo whisk in the time that he spent shaking it, js my opinion tho, it was really cute there

They have daily delicious handmade pastries, breakfast and good coffee. I tried the best gingerbread I ever had. The Dulce de leche and chocolate croissants are amazing.
Vicente is a must if you are in charlotte and the owners are super attentive and sweet.

Best bakery in North Carolina by far and they have such a variety of amazing goods. The owner was an executive chef at a very high end hotel. The staff is very friendly and the coffee is awesome . I go there twice a week .
Amazing pastry

This is a great place. Food is amazing! People are polite and the prices are beyond reasonable for this are. I got an egg and cheese croissant and a coffee for under 12 dollars. It is on the smaller side to sit down however they set up for seating perfect.
Charlotte's best bakery.

The girl who works here and takes order is RUDE. I was with my husband ordering and she put her hands on me like to stop talking when I was telling her what I want to order. She really has this negative attitude with her and shouldn't be working with people. Awful experience.
Apple monkey bread was out of this world good!

Omg. So good. That's all I have to say. Saw this place on an Instagram post, thought ok let's give it a try. Blown away!  Definitely a must try for bakery goods, especially loved the ham and cheese croissant! Also loved the chocolate croissant. So many more things to go back and try now!

Croissants well laminated and baked. Cherry crumble is not too sweet. Focaccia is very good and not oily.  Kouign amann should be crispier and sugar completely melted and crystallized. Ham and cheese could have some more filling. Coffee is average.
Great products and amazing service, 100% recommended!
Got the BLT croissant sandwich and it was HUGE!!!!! Plenty of bacon and very filling! The guava cream cheese Danish was good too .
Above average sandwich, factory look and lots of "customer is just in the way of my life and don't care" attitude is your thing, then is your place.
GREAT breakfast. Bakery goods and sandwiches are fantastic. One of the best in Charlotte. Highly recommended.
The best croissants I've had in Charlotte wrapped in a great atmosphere. I had the chocolate croissant and a latte and would highly recommend.

Phenomenal bakery in south end. The space is small, but they boast beautifully crafted pastries. They're creative, flaky, light, and flavorful. My favorite was the kouign-amann, though you can't go wrong with anything. They do change out what's offered, many things change daily, but they're always delicious.

The coffees are also good, but the pastries are where Vicente shines.
Love the food, coffee, and atmosphere!!

Store hours say 2pm and it is the 2nd time that I find closed doors at 1.06p and 1.13p. I'm very disappointed as it is a 17 min drive to get there.  Totally worth my time obviously as you have 5-star pastries and coffee.

So I ordered five different items and a latte and everything was amazing!!  I will be coming back to order every item I missed!  I just wrote about this place in The Boozeletter because you folks are doing an incredible job!  Savory and sweet every item was brilliant!   I'm beyond thrilled to have found this treasure!!
Simply ordered a chai latte half sweet, and it was so sweet that I couldn't even drink it. It was to go, so I was far away when I noticed. No number to call to correct the issue :/

The best coffee and Croissant Sandwiches in the world! I eat here 3-5 times a week. This place makes everyday better. Plus the owners are the best bakers and friendliest people you will ever meet. This place is my all time #1 Charlotte spot!

My wife brought a pain au chocolat and a cardamum bun home.

We've been missing the quality of pastries and baked goods since moving to the US from Sweden.

Vicente, along with OWL Bakery in Asheville, is the only thing I've tasted so far that comes close.

A needed bakery in Charlotte!
Delicious pastries  we love the croissants and all of the breakfast sandwiches. Great place for the weekend or weekday

The best bakery in town. I found their bakery items are better than the one I tasted in Italy. I'm not exaggerating! Their pistachio crumble and almond croissants are to die for. If I'm on my death bed I want to eat that pistachio crumble for one last time and die lol

Stop by this place around 1:30pm, they still had some bakery left. Girl who was taking our order looked very distracted. We ordered two medium cold brews without any milk, croissant and mini chicken pot pie. We paid about 27$, and then she says "Oh i forgot to put another coffee to your  order", and well i had to pay another 6$. Coffee was diluted and didn't taste like coffee at all.
Nothing had been heated up or even offered to be done that way, even Starbucks offers it. They replied to other customer in reviews that they should request it, i would say it's business responsibility offer it to appeal the customer.
Overall just another bakery in CLT, there are one in Camp North End that just as good and definitely in need of community support, her owner even was on a local news.
Delicious iced coffee and baked goods. Enjoyed a savory and a sweet and loved both.
Sam is super friendly and professional. He welcome everyone with a big greeting ! The lady at the back making the sandwich is super kind as well. I would definitely be back!!

My favorite place for laminated pastries, specifically croissants. Everyone is super friendly. They do a great job of having some standard offerings and mixing it up with new and interesting flavors.  The breakfast sandwich is really good and can tailored to your preference.
An absolute can't miss spot. The best bakery in Charlotte and it's run by fantastic people. A true blessing to have it so close. Run there!
Vicente is the best bakery in town, hands down! We love their croissants and other pastries. They spinach and feta is my favorite. Iced coffee is perfect, try the Dulce de Leche syrup!
The best pastry place in Charlotte hands down. I go every week and I have never been disappointed.  Staff is very friendly. 10/10
Vicente has the best pastries in Charlotte! There hasn't been a single pastry I've tried there that I haven't liked (and we've tried a lot!)
My favorite croissant in Charlotte! There is always something new to try and everything is always delicious.
Best croissant I've ever had!!! And the people are always so kind. Great coffee too. Go early to get the best stuff before they sell out!
Premium cafe in the Charlotte area featuring creative and fresh pastries baked fresh every day and state of the art coffee.

Adorable coffee shop with delicious coffee and even yummier pastries. We had a croissant and beef empanada. Just make sure to get there early. The first time we attempted to go, they were already closed because they were sold out. We will be back!

To each there own. I shared this with my family and they enjoyed thus place. However, I didn't. I also didn't like the pushiness of the server. It was my first time visiting the establishment and it felt like bih* get it and go type of feel. I will give it another try on that my family loved it and maybe my taste buds were off. Hopefully I was just in my feels that day.
Overall, found it over priced. The croissant shape looks attractive but taste is exactly like costco which you can easily get 12p in same price of 1.
I don't have words to say how delicious this place is. We order many things and everting was so fresh and crunchy. 10/10  thanks guys!!!

I have been here twice before 10 am and this place is sold out of anything but regular croissants. why don't they make more? i'm so disappointed, why should I try to come
back again if they won't make more pastries to keep up with demand. terrible.

A wonderful new(ish) bakery.  I wish to marry my
croissant. The space is open, bright, and welcoming.
I loved my egg bacon and cheese croissant, however, the coffee tasted like I was drinking gasoline. I couldn't event take more than 1 sip before throwing it out. Very dissapointing.
Great little coffee and croissant place!
Let me start by saying Vicente is definitely where you want to be starting your day! The various food choices make each day of the week amazing with the specials. See you there!
Got a breakfast sandwich (Croissant & egg), and it was delicious.  Service and atmosphere were also very good. Will be coming back to try their desserts.
Best bakery in Charlotte! The pastries are very fresh and delicious, the dulce de leche croissant is a must try. The service is great and very friendly.

The best bakery in Charlotte. The best pastries in Charlotte. NYC level. Run don't walk. You will not be disappointed. Yerman and the whole team does an amazing job from when you walk into the door, to when you leave. Please go to Vicente when you have a chance.
The feta and spinach croissant was delicious, the cake was very dry and the cappuccino was ok but no good

Delicious European style bakery with incredible croissants, breakfast sandwiches and pastries. We got there right at opening so everything was fresh. This visit we tried the Dulce de leche and Mixberries cruffin and they did not disappoint! They have a great variety - will definitely be coming back!

Everything about this shop was perfect. The decor, the bakery window, the coffee, the owners. Honestly the best croissant I've had in a long time and my kids loved the ube muffin! Thanks Sam for your kindness
XO- from Cincinnati
Best coffee I've ever had. Best staff ever. I get their coffee almost every morning, and it's always the best. Love love love love!
Best coffee in Charlotte!! Super sweet owners
This bistro is in a convenient location. The pastries are amazing and coffee is some of the best in the area. The staff is fast, friendly, and very welcoming.
One of the best patisserie in town!

In my opinion it's really the best bakery in the Charlotte area. The only con is if you go once it'll become a regular habit! I love that they change up the menu - you really can't go wrong. I would definitely suggest going early because if you want to try something it likely won't be there by noon!
Delicious croissants but definitely on the pricier side for Charlotte! Almost $6 for a classic croissant but what a treat. Some seats inside and great place to catch up with friends.
Really good chocolate chip cookies and crossiants. We were too late to try the ruffians but everything else we tried was really good.

My daughter in law, Melody as soon I arrived in Monroe, NC, the next day we go to Charlotte and visit Vicente Bakery. Herman, customer service is five star, food wise, every croissant is made perfectly flakiestly deliciously, breakfast sandwiches to the top, coffees.....all around service, atmosphere, everything about this place makes us go back for the day and also the chance to bring their goodies to my family back in Florida. Gracias, Vicente Bakery! Highly recommended....You guys are super awesome!
The pastries and croissants were delicious but super pricey.
The best croissant I've ever had.
Perfect. Fresh, made in house, super consistent. What else can I say? Best ham and cheese croissant ever!

Best hot chocolate and croissants in Charlotte. I'm obsessed with this place and have met 3 different people here for breakfast already. Quiet and slow enough inside to sit at the tables by the bathroom and catch up for an hour.
Hi, this is Lily. My husband and I love the service and Michelin 5stars-quality pastries in Vicente. Thank you so much being close to us!
Scratch made fresh pastries. Nice selection of coffee drinks. Quick and friendly service. Great spot for a quick breakfast or a snack.

This place should be sued for how delicious their blueberry danish was. Because I am trying to lose weight and that Danish has me wanting to order 20 more. The croissant crust surrounding the blueberry and cream as well as the crust surrounding the spinach and feta was so delicious. The food was also packed so beautifully. I ordered the croissant with bacon egg and cheese, the chocolate croissant, the Kouign Amann, the spinach and feta croissant and the blue berry danish.  The Danish and the spinach and feta were my favs. I will definitely order from this place again. Can't wait to try all of the menu, and hopefully they will expand their menu on door dash.
Finally, a wonderful patisserie in Charlotte! We needed this so bad
Vicente is the best bakery in Charlotte.
Excellent service, and the food is excellent. I recommend the dulce de leche croasaint. They also won the Best Bakery 2023 award at Queen City Nerve
Great afternoon treat!
This is the best bakery in Charlotte. Simple and delicious pastries alongside some really inventive creations too. The people are the best part. Cannot recommend more!
The best croissant in Charlotte and it's not even close. Friendly employees. Latte was a 4/5. We will be back!
It's the best bakery here in Charlotte and they are local. They are also Latino which is a bonus!
BEST PASTRIES IN CLT!
Best bakery in CLT
They never have what they say
This is the best place to find French pastries! They were delicious!  People at Vicente are very nice, very welcoming and go above and beyond! We will for sure come here again!
We tried everything, and all of it was absolutely amazing. Probably one of the best bakeries in Charlotte
Excellent croissants, great atmosphere!
The best croissants by far that I've had in Charlotte

The bakery it's outstanding.

I would definitely recommend this place if you really want to have a nice breakfast.

My favorites are the toast with onion butter and dulce de leche one.
Heaven!  Best croissants I've had since Paris.    I will drive for miles to get these!
Truly a hidden gem. I had the spinach and feta croissant pastry, and it was perfection. Buttery and flakey with the right amount of filling.

Indulging in the delectable pastries at this bakery is a pure delight. The monkey bread is a must-try - it's worth setting that early weekend alarm for the incredible experience it offers. Every bite makes the early wake-up completely worthwhile!
Been coming here ever since it opened, you will not find nicer people and better pastries anywhere else near here. Everything is fresh!
These are heavenly and the service is amazing and speedy!
Excellent croissant with jam  and latte , thanks guys.
This chocolate croissant was the best I've ever eaten.

Stopped in here the other morning and found myself in a bit of a dilemma since everything looked stunning. I went with this pumpkin white chocolate hybrid loaf croissant which was bigger than my hand. They don't skimp out on the size so you are sure to leave with a full stomach and a happy heart. The top was extra crunchy and the inside was light and airy. It didn't have a ton of filling, but the croissant was the star of the show here so I didn't mind. I definitely see myself coming back here again in the near future!

There is not a bakery in Charlotte, that I would recommend more highly than I would this place! I have not had a bad visit here, and everything here is amazing. The staff is always very friendly, and even though this place is in high demand, the line moves so quickly! Whether you live in Charlotte, or are visiting Charlotte, this is a place you need to come enjoy!
Just perfect!  The flavor of each croissant is totally different and delicious at the same time! I recommend the dulce de leche one. I love
Best croissants in Charlotte, hands down.
Best croissants in Charlotte
Delicious, hand crafted pastries and sweet staff!
I frequently stop in for breakfast here! The matcha, breakfast sandwiches & croissants are the best! Sam, Leo, Sekai, Yerman & Lauren always provide the best customer service as well. Love them
Best croissant in the city by far.
Best pastry shop in Charlotte! Their dulce de leche pastry is unbelievable!!
Best coffee and croissants in USA by far!
Their croissants are so great, also love their bread and some other pastries.

The baked goods are delicious, however, I arrive a few minutes before 11:00 on Saturday, and I suppose it was 11:01 by the time I was helped. I ordered what I saw them making at the kitchen behind the counter, a delicious looking egg sandwich with cheese, bacon, and a delectable spread on a croissant.

They looked me dead in the face and said "no" because it was after 11:00. I personally observed a carafe of mixed egg that was presumably used for something else other than making me and selling me what I asked for.

On a weekend, this hardline cutoff at 11:00 seems arbitrary and petty. I gently gave them another opportunity to say "yeah we can make an exception," but was unsuccessful.

Their items are delicious, but I'm inclined to not return in principle, and find another bakery that also makes delicious things, and also recognizes that maybe it's beneficial to sell a customer something they highly desire and have an unlimited willingness to pay.

Muy rico... Primera vez que vengo y quede encantada. Super rico los alfajores. Super rico las galletas, super rico el pan de masa de hojaldre relleno de jamon y queso. La masa super fresca. De verdad que los super recomiendo. 5 estrellas. Y el dueno super chevere...

Tried this place for the first time this morning and OMG SO GOOD!! Best place in Charlotte to get croissants and they have a great variety. The cafe is so cute and the staff is so nice. I tried the regular croissant, the feta and tomato croissant, and an iced honey vanilla latte. Everything was 10/10. I will be back!

This place has amazing croissants. Be sure to get there early for availability. If you go before closing it is likely they have sold out of a lot of items. I love taking a butter croissant home for a delicious breakfast sandwich the next morning at home.

Vicente bakery is the best thing in Charlotte, the croissant is what makes me visit them every time I go to the city, and the service. The good thing is that the cashier is no longer there. Savanna was always wrong with the order, confused. It's also good that the bitter boy who made the coffee left, very bad attitude. Congratulations to the owners of Vicente, Sam is the master of dessert, German makes the experience pleasant. They are a team. I love Vincent
We go here way too often but it is hard not to when it's downstairs from our apt. It is delicious! Honestly some of the best pastries we have ever had.
The best and airless croissants ever!!! The almond and raspberry are delicious!

Wow. This is easily the BEST place to find croissants and any other French patisserie treats in the Charlotte area. I've been here on several different weekend mornings now and have tried many different things here - everything across the board is phenomenal. The bakery itself is beautiful but the croissants and other pastries are just absolutely delicious quality. Like other reviews have said, try to go earlier rather than later on weekend mornings!

They are so NICE!! Amazing pastries that are absolutely gorgeous too. The coffee was so good with the dolce de ledge syrup  I tend to be very picky with coffee and I loved it. Super cute little shop. I want to come here every day.
Most delicious croissants in Charlotte !

Exquisita la comida y la ambientacion muy linda.
Sus Croissant son increiblemente crocantes, los probe en su version original, chocolate, y spinach & feta.
Tambien probe el rol de canela, y esta muy delicioso.
La atencion de German hace mucho mejor la experiencia.
Best pastries in the Charlotte area! Really friendly service as well.
Absolutely delectable. Breath of fresh air to find a cafe in Charlotte that doesn't just sell 10oz overpriced cups of coffee and stale pastries (looking at you LTH).
Great high end bakery offering a good selection of delicious pastries. Their croissants and chocolate chip cookies are standouts.

As a Frenchman, I've enjoyed thousands of croissants throughout my life. These croissants are truly exceptional, rivaling those found in France and easily among the best I've ever tasted
(5x more expensive though, almost dropped my baguette of surprise)
They never have what the menu says
Really delish pastries!

Best croissants in Charlotte...  We had dulche de leche, tomato and feta, and kouign amann. All of them were delicious. Koign amann could have been better without the sprinkled sugar. I also had hazelnut latte, it was okay. Liked the fact that they have dairy free options. Will definitely go back to try other pastries.
What a wonderful place! Great coffee, croissants, and atmosphere. Can't wait to go back:

We are new to the neighborhood and stopped in for a cold brew and croissant and breakfast sandwich. The coffee was good and reasonably priced, and the sandwich was large, made fresh to order, and delicious. The star was the pain au chocolat, which was amazing. Going to have to limit myself to one trip a week!
Amazing croissants!
By far the best bakery in Charlotte area! Everything is baked fresh daily and the owners are a true joy!

The people at Vicente go above and beyond. From an Argentinian bakery lover, this are the best pastries I ever try. The dulce the leche one is amazing.
The ham and cheese is SO good and the breakfast sandwich is fresh in the moment and unique.
Thank you for bringing to Charlotte the best of the best.
The croissants are one of the best I ever tried. Outstanding!

I visited this cafe for the first time today and I was pleasantly surprised. The service was incredibly helpful, accommodating, timely, and full of culture. I ordered two pastries and a coffee both of which were prepared nicely and tasted good. The interior design was beautiful, I especially enjoyed the plant that sat in between two of the many tables that were there. They also are working on a walk-through for anybody who has pets or just likes to walk. I highly recommend it for coffee and pastry lovers alike.
La atencion, la comida y en ambiente son increibles. Definitivamente volvere pronto.
Their pastries and coffee are GREAT! By 1 pm they were basically sold out. Great place, great people! Probably the best coffee shop/ bakery in Charlotte!
What an awesome spot. The food is dope but the staff and management are fire. Herman was mad cool and generally a good dude. Will be back for some morning treats. Gracias hermano!
Thank you so much for making incredible gluten free items! It's so hard to find coffee shops with anything gluten free. The muffins, scones, and cookies are amazing!
excellent place, the owner super nice and friendly, the food was very tasty
Extremely delicious pastries! One of the best bakeries in town. Very good service! They even gave free cookies and milk for our kids. Their Chocolates are very good as well and fairly priced.
This place is amazing. I am such a pastry lover and their croissants are perfection.

Finally a croissant shop has come to charlotte this place is absolutely delicious! I'm pretty sure I was speaking to the owner/baker He is very knowledgeable with his pastries I asked how many layers are in the croissants he did the math lol. ( I will not eat a croissant that's less than a hundred layers It gives it that nice flakey buttery taste ect) I bought a few So far, I've tasted only 2 of the 4 but tears came to my eyes as I was finally able To partake in the Buttery flakiness Without driving two hours to raleigh for their croissant shop. Lifetime customer here!
What a great addition to the South End. The spinach and feta croissant was phenomenal.

Incredible pastries, some of the best I've ever tasted!! Everything is frequently made and fresh, and they offer lots of variety so I never know what I'm gonna get when I walk in (which I love)!

The downside is that Vicente isn't a great place to work. There are absolutely no outlets, the hours are weird (closed on Monday and close at 2pm on weekdays), and there aren't comfy chairs to sit in- only stools. It's disappointing that I can't work well there but it's an amazing spot for breakfast before work!

I also have to note that there are lots of fruit flies buzzing around, and there were ants underneath the table next to me.
Delicious pastry's and excellent customer service
if you wanna taste the best brake fast of all charlotte you have to go there
Amazing croissants and excellent service courtesy of Savanah
I highly recommend this place, great customer service, atmosphere, and baked goods. I haven't tried anything I don't like.
this place dunks on paneras baked goods so hard it's disrespectful
Unbelievable freshly baked pastries and breakfast sandwich. Really appreciate the variety in pastries, always something new and delicious to try each time you visit.
Kouign Aman was good...tastes like a less sweet version of monkey bread
Amazing pastries and coffee! I would say probably the best in Charlotte. Get there early on the weekend as they sell out quickly.

Once again, Vicente never disappoints. Came here over 4th of July weekend and we tried their almond guava and red white & berry croissant. Absolutely spectacular. Despite the disgruntled patron Francisco, Sam or any of his staff is more than accommodating to heat up your croissant. All you have to do is simply ask. Further, while they do sell out quickly it's no surprise as everything here is amazing.
They ran out of everything, order a croissant and they did not even offer to warmed it up.

Ordered a vanilla iced latte and breakfast sandwich on a croissant and both were delicious! The iced latte was one of the best in the southend area and the croissant was buttery and perfectly made. Prices are also very fair and the staff was very nice.

This is my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte! The dulce de leche latte is life changing, and the pastries are incredible! I love checking out all the new treats they have. The owner and baristas are super friendly/great too! Awesome addition to the neighborhood!

Review: Vicente - Croissant Perfection

Vicente is a bakery that has perfected the art of crafting mouthwatering croissants. Their flaky, buttery creations are simply divine. With a range of flavors to choose from, each bite is a delightful explosion of taste, but my favorite is the almond. The quality ingredients and attention to detail make Vicente a must-visit.
best bakery in charlotte! their chocolate croissant and chocolate cruffins are amazing!!!
Chocolate croissant is really good )
Muy rico pan y cafe. Ademas de un lugar muy comodo hay una buena atencion. Gracias a los miembros de Vicente.

Nice new bakery with delicious goods from different parts of the world and great drinks. People are very friendly but you need to go there early in the morning if you want to have a better selection. We went on Saturday at 10 am and it was almost sold out.

Super delicious pastries and amazing service! Cannot wait to come back and try more of their pastries and drinks. Highly recommend their egg and cheese croissant sandwich and their strawberry croissant!

Vicente completely surpassed my expectations. Their butter croissants are unrivaled in Charlotte, with perfect flavor and flakiness. Don't miss out on their mouthwatering alfajores! Their savory pastries, like the ham & cheese and tomato feta, are exceptional. The cookies strike the right balance of sweetness, and they even offer gluten-free options. I love how they blend flavors from Latin America and Europe--it's a winning combination. Come early because their pastries sell fast.
Good coffee and great pastries! Pastries are fresh baked and very tasty (I usually get a croissant). Definitely recommend the breakfast sandwich with egg, ham, and cheese!

So I normally don't leave reviews. That is how good this place is. They might have the best breakfast sandwich in Charlotte. 8$ and you get a huge croissant, a bunch of egg and cheese, and it's delicious. We also had the Dulce de Leche iced latte which was great, and a chocolate croissant. Will be back frequently.
The smell captures you from outside, once you step inside the selection of fresh bakery items is breathtaking. The fresh croissants are to die for. Will definitely be back!
Amazing Nutella croissants
Great pastries and drinks!

I was so excited for a bakery to open up in this part of south end! The ham & cheese croissant and lemon chai scone were delicious.  Have yet to try the cinnamon twist, saving it for dessert.  Will definitely come back!

Yum! I got the feta and tomato croissant and it was delicious. Went back the next day and got the ham and goat cheese and it was even better. Super nice staff getting up and running and they're doing great! Happy to have a new neighborhood spot.

The best new bakery and coffee shop in South End. Great options for breakfast and lunch! They make a variety of ready to go croissants, sandwiches, flatbread pizzas, brownies, cookies, and Latin pastries! Everything we tried has been delicious. Highly recommended!

Run don't walk!  Hands down the absolute BEST bakery & coffee in all of Charlotte. Nothing here disappoints. From croissants, kouign amann, GF cheesecake and beyond, everything is just scrumptious! This is the place to be and will definitely return!

Congratulations to the Vicente team! Food takes me back to Europe and Latin America where much of the menu inspiration comes from! Pastries  are made to perfection and perfectly paired with the coffee being served!
Lovely coffee shop owned by a caring, passionate couple! The croissants are to die for and look as good as they taste. Will be back!! 10/10 customer service
Amazing Gluten- Free and Vegan options baked in house!
Vicente is very convenient to have in the building. Great place to grab a fresh brewed coffee and pastry.
